get.description: Lists all the jobs available under the given resource group.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of jobs, which provides the next page in the list of jobs.

get.description: Gets information about the specified job.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on details parameter for job, which provides details on the job stages.

put.description: Creates a new job with the specified parameters. Existing job cannot be updated with this API and should instead be updated with the Update job API.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

parameters.name: jobResource
parameters.description: Job details from request body.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Updates the properties of an existing job.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the job on the server matches this value.

parameters.name: jobResourceUpdateParameter
parameters.description: Job update parameters from request body.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

AccessProtocol.description: Access protocols supported on the device.

accountConnectionString.description: Connection string of the account endpoint to use the account as a storage endpoint on the device.

shareCredentialDetails.description: Per share level unencrypted access credentials.

AdditionalErrorInfo.description: This class represents additional info which Resource Providers pass when an error occurs.

info.description: Additional information of the type of error.

type.description: Type of error (e.g. CustomerIntervention, PolicyViolation, SecurityViolation).

AddressValidationOutput.description: Output of the address validation api.

values.name: Invalid
values.description: Address provided is invalid or not supported.

values.name: Ambiguous
values.description: Address provided is ambiguous, please choose one of the alternate addresses returned.

ApplianceNetworkConfiguration.description: The Network Adapter configuration of a DataBox.

ArmBaseObject.description: Base class for all objects under resource.

AvailableSkuRequest.description: The filters for showing the available skus.

country.description: ISO country code. Country for hardware shipment. For codes check: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements

location.description: Location for data transfer. For locations check: https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/SUBSCRIPTIONID/locations?api-version=2018-01-01

skuNames.description: Sku Names to filter for available skus

AzureFileFilterDetails.description: Filter details to transfer Azure files

filePrefixList.description: Prefix list of the Azure files to be transferred.

filePathList.description: List of full path of the files to be transferred.

fileShareList.description: List of file shares to be transferred.

BlobFilterDetails.description: Filter details to transfer Azure Blobs

blobPrefixList.description: Prefix list of the Azure blobs to be transferred.

blobPathList.description: List of full path of the blobs to be transferred.

containerList.description: List of blob containers to be transferred.

ClassDiscriminator.description: Indicates the type of job details.

CloudError.description: Provides additional information about an http error response.

additionalInfo.description: Gets or sets additional error info.

details.description: Gets or sets details for the error.

message.description: The error message parsed from the body of the http error response.

target.description: Gets or sets the target of the error.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

phoneExtension.description: Phone extension number of the contact person.

mobile.description: Mobile number of the contact person.

emailList.description: List of Email-ids to be notified about job progress.

notificationPreference.description: Notification preference for a job stage.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

phoneExtension.description: Phone extension number of the contact person.

mobile.description: Mobile number of the contact person.

CopyLogDetails.description: Details for log generated during copy.

copyLogDetailsType.description: Indicates the type of job details.

storageAccountName.description: Name of the storage account. This will be empty for data account types other than storage account.

accountId.description: Id of the account where the data needs to be uploaded.

totalBytesToProcess.description: Total amount of data to be processed by the job.

invalidFilesProcessed.description: Number of files not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

invalidFileBytesUploaded.description: Total amount of data not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

renamedContainerCount.description: Number of folders not adhering to azure naming conventions which were processed by automatic renaming

filesErroredOut.description: Number of files which could not be copied

directoriesErroredOut.description: To indicate directories errored out in the job.

isEnumerationInProgress.description:
To indicate if enumeration of data is in progress.
Until this is true, the TotalBytesToProcess may not be valid.

error.description: Error, if any, in the stage

values.name: Failed
values.description: Data copy failed. No data was copied.

values.name: NotReturned
values.description: No copy triggered as device was not returned.

values.name: HardwareError
values.description: The Device has hit hardware issues.

values.name: DeviceFormatted
values.description: Data copy failed. The Device was formatted by user.

values.name: DeviceMetadataModified
values.description: Data copy failed. Device metadata was modified by user.

values.name: StorageAccountNotAccessible
values.description: Data copy failed. Storage Account was not accessible during copy.

values.name: UnsupportedData
values.description: Data copy failed. The Device data content is not supported.

values.name: DriveNotReceived
values.description: No copy triggered as device was not received.

values.name: UnsupportedDrive
values.description: No copy triggered as device type is not supported.

values.name: OtherServiceError
values.description: Copy failed due to service error.

values.name: OtherUserError
values.description: Copy failed due to user error.

values.name: DriveNotDetected
values.description: Copy failed due to disk detection error.

values.name: DriveCorrupted
values.description: Copy failed due to corrupted drive.

values.name: MetadataFilesModifiedOrRemoved
values.description: Copy failed due to modified or removed metadata files.

deviceType.description: Device type to be used for the job.

values.name: ReachOutToOperation
values.description: Reach out to operation for further action.

DataAccountDetails.description: Account details of the data to be transferred

dataAccountType.description: Account Type of the data to be transferred.

sharePassword.description: Password for all the shares to be created on the device. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

DataBoxAccountCopyLogDetails.description: Copy log details for a storage account of a DataBox job

copyVerboseLogLink.description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when LogCollectionLevel is set to Verbose.

DataBoxCustomerDiskCopyLogDetails.description: Copy Log Details for customer disk

importDiskDetailsCollection.description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk details for import jobs.

exportDiskDetailsCollection.description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk details for export jobs.

enableManifestBackup.description: Flag to indicate if disk manifest should be backed-up in the Storage Account.

DataBoxDiskCopyLogDetails.description: Copy Log Details for a disk

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the disk

bytesCopied.description: Bytes copied during the copy of disk.

percentComplete.description: Indicates the percentage completed for the copy of the disk.

error.description: Error, if any, in the stage

DataBoxDiskGranularCopyLogDetails.description: Granular Copy Log Details for customer disk

preferredDisks.description: User preference on what size disks are needed for the job. The map is from the disk size in TB to the count. Eg. {2,5} means 5 disks of 2 TB size. Key is string but will be checked against an int.

disksAndSizeDetails.description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk size being used for the job. Is returned only after the disks are shipped to the customer.

passkey.description: User entered passkey for DataBox Disk job.

diskSecrets.description: Contains the list of secrets object for that device.

isPasskeyUserDefined.description: Whether passkey was provided by user.

If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

supportedAccessProtocols.description: Access protocols supported on the device.

startTime.description: Minimum date after which the pick up should commence, this must be in local time of pick up area.

endTime.description: Maximum date before which the pick up should commence, this must be in local time of pick up area.

shipmentLocation.description: Shipment Location in the pickup place. Eg.front desk

confirmationNumber.description: Confirmation number for the pick up request.

readyByTime.description: Time by which shipment should be ready for pick up, this is in local time of pick up area.

ShippingAddress.description: Shipping address where customer wishes to receive the device.

stateOrProvince.description: Name of the State or Province.

skipAddressValidation.description: Flag to indicate if customer has chosen to skip default address validation

displayName.description: The display name of the sku.

model.description: The customer friendly name of the combination of version and capacity of the device. This field is necessary only at the time of ordering the newer generation device i.e. AzureDataBox120 and AzureDataBox525 as of Feb/2025

deviceType.description: Device type to be used for the job.

country.description: ISO country code. Country for hardware shipment. For codes check: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements

location.description: Location for data transfer. For locations check: https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/SUBSCRIPTIONID/locations?api-version=2018-01-01

model.description: The customer friendly name of the combination of version and capacity of the device. This field is necessary only at the time of ordering the newer generation device i.e. AzureDataBox120 and AzureDataBox525 as of Feb/2025

SkuAvailabilityValidationResponsePropert.description: Properties of sku availability validation response.

individualSkuUsable.description: Maximum capacity per device in TB.

SkuCost.description: Describes metadata for retrieving price info.

multiplier.description: Multiplier specifies the region specific value to be multiplied with 1$ guid. Eg: Our new regions will be using 1$ shipping guid with appropriate multiplier specific to region.

SkuDisabledReason.description: Reason why the Sku is disabled.

values.name: Country
values.description: SKU is not available in the requested country.

values.name: Region
values.description: SKU is not available to push data to the requested Azure region.

values.name: Feature
values.description: Required features are not enabled for the SKU.

values.name: OfferType
values.description: Subscription does not have required offer types for the SKU.

values.name: NoSubscriptionInfo
values.description: Subscription has not registered to Microsoft.DataBox and Service does not have the subscription notification.

enabled.description: The sku is enabled or not.

dataLocationToServiceLocationMap.description: The map of data location to service location.

apiVersions.description: Api versions that support this Sku.

disabledReason.description: Reason why the Sku is disabled.

disabledReasonMessage.description: Message for why the Sku is disabled.

requiredFeature.description: Required feature to access the sku.

countriesWithinCommerceBoundary.description: List of all the Countries in the SKU specific commerce boundary

StageName.description: Name of the stage which is in progress.

values.name: DevicePrepared
values.description: A device has been prepared for the order.

values.name: Dispatched
values.description: Device has been dispatched to the user of the order.

values.name: Delivered
values.description: Device has been delivered to the user of the order.

values.name: PickedUp
values.description: Device has been picked up from user and in transit to Azure datacenter.

values.name: AtAzureDC
values.description: Device has been received at Azure datacenter from the user.

values.name: DataCopy
values.description: Data copy from the device at Azure datacenter.

values.name: Failed_IssueReportedAtCustomer
values.description: Order has failed due to issue reported by user.

values.name: Failed_IssueDetectedAtAzureDC
values.description: Order has failed due to issue detected at Azure datacenter.

values.name: ReadyToDispatchFromAzureDC
values.description: Device is ready to be handed to customer from Azure DC.

values.name: ReadyToReceiveAtAzureDC
values.description: Device can be dropped off at Azure DC.

values.name: ShippedToAzureDC
values.description: User shipped the device to AzureDC.

values.name: AwaitingShipmentDetails
values.description: Awaiting shipment details of device from customer.

values.name: PreparingToShipFromAzureDC
values.description: Preparing the device to ship to customer.

StageStatus.description: Holds the device erasure completion status

values.name: WaitingForCustomerAction
values.description: Stage is stuck until customer takes some action.

values.name: WaitingForCustomerActionForKek
values.description: Stage is waiting for customer action for kek action items.

values.name: WaitingForCustomerActionForCleanUp
values.description: Stage is waiting for customer action for clean up.

values.name: CustomerActionPerformedForCleanUp
values.description: Stage has performed customer action for clean up.

values.name: CustomerActionPerformed
values.description: Stage has performed customer action for clean up.

SubscriptionIsAllowedToCreateJobValidati.description: Request to validate subscription permission to create jobs.
Properties of subscription permission to create job validation response.

status.description: Validation status of subscription permission to create job.

dataAccountType.description: Type of the account of data

transferAllBlobs.description: To indicate if all Azure blobs have to be transferred

transferAllFiles.description: To indicate if all Azure Files have to be transferred

TransferConfiguration.description: Configuration for defining the transfer of data.

transferConfigurationType.description: Type of the configuration for transfer.

transferFilterDetails.description: Map of filter type and the details to filter. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferUsingFilter.

transferAllDetails.description: Map of filter type and the details to transfer all data. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferAll

TransferConfigurationTransferAllDetails.description: Map of filter type and the details to transfer all data. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferAll

TransferConfigurationTransferFilterDetai.description: Map of filter type and the details to filter. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferUsingFilter.

include.description: Details of the filtering the transfer of data.

TransferConfigurationType.description: Type of the configuration for transfer.

TransferFilterDetails.description: Details of the filtering the transfer of data.

dataAccountType.description: Type of the account of data.

azureFileFilterDetails.description: Filter details to transfer Azure files.

filterFileDetails.description: Details of the filter files to be used for data transfer.

TransportAvailabilityDetails.description: Transport options availability details for given region.

shipmentType.description: Transport Shipment Type supported for given region.

TransportAvailabilityRequest.description: Request body to get the transport availability for given sku.

model.description: The customer friendly name of the combination of version and capacity of the device. This field is necessary only at the time of ordering the newer generation device i.e. AzureDataBox120 and AzureDataBox525 as of Feb/2025

TransportAvailabilityResponse.description: Transport options available for given sku in a region.

transportAvailabilityDetails.description: List of transport availability details for given region

TransportPreferences.description: Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the sku

preferredShipmentType.description: Indicates Shipment Logistics type that the customer preferred.

isUpdated.description: Read only property which indicates whether transport preferences has been updated or not after device is prepared.

TransportShipmentTypes.description: Transport Shipment Type supported for given region.

values.name: CustomerManaged
values.description: Shipment Logistics is handled by the customer.

values.name: MicrosoftManaged
values.description: Shipment Logistics is handled by Microsoft.

UnencryptedCredentialsList.description: List of unencrypted credentials for accessing device.

value.description: The UnencryptedCredentials items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

contactDetails.description: Contact details for notification and shipping.

reverseShippingDetails.description: Reverse Shipping Address and contact details for a job.

keyEncryptionKey.description: Key encryption key for the job.

details.description: Details of a job to be updated.

resourceId.description: Arm resource id for user assigned identity to be used to fetch MSI token.

ValidateAddress.description: The requirements to validate customer address where the device needs to be shipped.

deviceType.description: Device type to be used for the job.

transportPreferences.description: Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the sku.

model.description: The customer friendly name of the combination of version and capacity of the device. This field is necessary only at the time of ordering the newer generation device i.e. AzureDataBox120 and AzureDataBox525 as of Feb/2025

ValidationInputDiscriminator.description: Identifies the type of validation request.

values.name: ValidateAddress
values.description: Identify request and response of address validation.

values.name: ValidateSubscriptionIsAllowedToCreateJob
values.description: Identify request and response for validation of subscription permission to create job.

values.name: ValidatePreferences
values.description: Identify request and response of preference validation.

values.name: ValidateCreateOrderLimit
values.description: Identify request and response of create order limit for subscription validation.

values.name: ValidateSkuAvailability
values.description: Identify request and response of active job limit for sku availability.

values.name: ValidateDataTransferDetails
values.description: Identify request and response of data transfer details validation.

ValidationInputRequest.description: Minimum fields that must be present in any type of validation request.

validationType.description: Identifies the type of validation request.

ValidationInputResponse.description: Minimum properties that should be present in each individual validation response.

validationType.description: Identifies the type of validation response.

error.description: Error code and message of validation response.

ValidationRequest.description: Minimum request requirement of any validation category.

individualRequestDetails.description: List of request details contain validationType and its request as key and value respectively.

ValidationResponse.description: Response of pre job creation validations.

properties.description: Properties of pre job creation validation response.

ValidationResponseProperties.description: Properties of pre job creation validation response.

individualResponseDetails.description: List of response details contain validationType and its response as key and value respectively.
